alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 5:21AM EDT until April 10 at 11:36PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Pennsylvania...New York... Susquehanna River At Conklin affecting Broome and Susquehanna Counties. For the Susquehanna River New York...including Owego, Unadilla, Windsor, Bainbridge, Conklin, Binghamton Washington Street, Vestal, Waverly/Sayre...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Susquehanna River At Conklin. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flood stage. Alta, River and Lawrence Roads closed in the Town of Conklin due to minor flooding. No homes are flooded at this river stage. Valley park in Kirkwood takes on water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:01 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 12.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:01 AM EDT Saturday was 12.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
